oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Optomechanical test of the Schr\"odinger-Newton equation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Großardt, André
Bateman, James
Ulbricht, Hendrik
Bassi, Angelo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
General Relativity and Quantum Cosmology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Schr\"odinger-Newton equation has been proposed as an experimentally testable alternative to quantum gravity, accessible at low energies. It contains self-gravitational terms, which slightly modify the quantum dynamics. Here we show that it distorts the spectrum of a harmonic system. Based on this effect, we propose an optomechanical experiment with a trapped microdisc to test the Schr\"odinger-Newton equation, and we show that it can be realized with existing technology.
Comment: 13 pages, 4 figures, 1 table, 1 page of supplemental material
